I'll never get tired of replaying the half life series

This game is bad, especially compared to the original Half Life 2. 
Even on low difficulty the game just spawns new enemies without a break so every level turns into a mess (As an example: Lowlife levels). Of course you have no ammo to defeat them all, and Alyx acts very stupid - she doesn't follow you, she doesn't protect you. 
I am extremely disappointed. 3/10

A short sequel to Half-Life 2, this game plays a lot different than Half-Life 2 and it shows, an achievement even shows just how different the play style HL 2: Ep 1 has which is "The One Free Bullet" which only makes you shoot a bullet ONCE, meaning that you need to kill enemies with the crowbar, rpg, grenades, and props via the gravity gun to get the achievement. This is possible because for most of the game Alyx will be assisting you with her pistol and later in the game a shotgun. This is somewhat disorienting at first but as to get used to it it'll definitely become fun. Story is also amazing considering how short the game is, and still manages to imerse you as Gordon Freeman like Half-Life 2. All in all I'd definitely recommend it, especially if you liked Half-Life 2. A wonderful game indeed.

This "Episode" is a disappointment.
After the cliffhanger in Half Life 2, Episode One is a weak amends.
It delivers no closure, instead it leaves you with another cliffhanger.
Hunting for steam-achievements is quite fun, altough I probably wont play it again for "This One Free Bullet".
Didn't like it as much as Half Life 2. But its still an Half Life game.

Mimo iż ta część dodaje tylko 5 nowych rzeczy ( flary, zombine, walka ze stalkerami, hackowanie min i tryb komentarzy twórców)  to mimo wszystko dalej jest to godna polecenia odsłona Half life'a.  Wielkim minusem jest natomiast niesamowicie krótki czas trwania kampanii.

Jamás pensé que llegaría a conocer la continuación de la historia de Half Life 2, titulo anterior al actual.
Me ha permitido conocer detalles de la historia, conocer mejor a los personajes. Entender conceptos de la historia anterior. Se implementan mecánicas, físicas gracias al motor source 2 de valve, permitiendo en ocasiones detallar texturas y escenarios de forma significativa al titulo anterior.
